MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML10 postcode area of Strathaven. We had no advance warning of this, however our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still investigating the fault affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08:04am on Wednesday, 03 February 2021.
